verses.text: And thou shalt make an altar to burn incense upon: \add of\add* shittim wood shalt thou make it.

A cubit \add shall be\add* the length thereof, and a cubit the breadth thereof; foursquare shall it be: and two cubits \add shall be\add* the height thereof: the horns thereof \add shall be\add* of the same.

And thou shalt overlay it with pure gold , the top thereof, and the sides thereof round about , and the horns thereof; and thou shalt make unto it a crown of gold round about.\f + \fr 30.3 \ft top: Heb. roof\f*\f + \fr 30.3 \ft sides: Heb. walls\f*

And two golden rings shalt thou make to it under the crown of it, by the two corners thereof, upon the two sides of it shalt thou make \add it;\add* and they shall be for places for the staves to bear it withal.\f + \fr 30.4 \ft corners: Heb. ribs\f*
And thou shalt make the staves \add of\add* shittim wood , and overlay them with gold.
And thou shalt put it before the vail that \add is\add* by the ark of the testimony , before the mercy seat that \add is\add* over the testimony , where I will meet with thee.
And Aaron shall burn thereon sweet incense every morning : when he dresseth the lamps , he shall burn incense upon it.\f + \fr 30.7 \ft sweet incense: Heb. incense of spices\f*

And when Aaron lighteth the lamps at even , he shall burn incense upon it, a perpetual incense before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* throughout your generations.\f + \fr 30.8 \ft lighteth: or setteth up: Heb. causeth to ascend\f*\f + \fr 30.8 \ft at even: Heb. between the two evenings\f*
Ye shall offer no strange incense thereon, nor burnt sacrifice , nor meat offering ; neither shall ye pour drink offering thereon.

And Aaron shall make an atonement upon the horns of it once in a year with the blood of the sin offering of atonements : once in the year shall he make atonement upon it throughout your generations : it \add is\add* most holy unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

When thou takest the sum of the children of Israel after their number , then shall they give every man a ransom for his soul unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when thou numberest them; that there be no plague among them, when \add thou\add* numberest them.\f + \fr 30.12 \ft their number: Heb. them that are to be numbered\f*

This they shall give , every one that passeth among them that are numbered , half a shekel after the shekel of the sanctuary : (a shekel \add is\add* twenty gerahs :) an half shekel \add shall be\add* the offering of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Every one that passeth among them that are numbered , from twenty years old and above , shall give an offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

The rich shall not give more , and the poor shall not give less than half a shekel , when \add they\add* give an offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an atonement for your souls.\f + \fr 30.15 \ft give more: Heb. multiply\f*\f + \fr 30.15 \ft give less: Heb. diminish\f*

And thou shalt take the atonement money of the children of Israel , and shalt appoint it for the service of the tabernacle of the congregation ; that it may be a memorial unto the children of Israel before the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, to make an atonement for your souls. \p
¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

Thou shalt also make a laver \add of\add* brass , and his foot \add also of\add* brass , to wash \add withal:\add* and thou shalt put it between the tabernacle of the congregation and the altar , and thou shalt put water therein.
For Aaron and his sons shall wash their hands and their feet thereat:

When they go into the tabernacle of the congregation , they shall wash with water , that they die not; or when they come near to the altar to minister , to burn offering made by fire unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:
So they shall wash their hands and their feet , that they die not: and it shall be a statute for ever to them, \add even\add* to him and to his seed throughout their generations. \p
¶ Moreover the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* spake unto Moses , saying ,

Take thou also unto thee principal spices , of pure myrrh five hundred \add shekels\add*, and of sweet cinnamon half so much , \add even\add* two hundred and fifty \add shekels\add*, and of sweet calamus two hundred and fifty \add shekels\add*,
And of cassia five hundred \add shekels\add*, after the shekel of the sanctuary , and of oil olive an hin :
And thou shalt make it an oil of holy ointment , an ointment compound after the art of the apothecary : it shall be an holy anointing oil.\f + \fr 30.25 \ft apothecary: or, perfumer\f*
And thou shalt anoint the tabernacle of the congregation therewith, and the ark of the testimony ,
And the table and all his vessels , and the candlestick and his vessels , and the altar of incense ,
And the altar of burnt offering with all his vessels , and the laver and his foot.
And thou shalt sanctify them, that they may be most holy : whatsoever toucheth them shall be holy.
And thou shalt anoint Aaron and his sons , and consecrate them, that \add they\add* may minister unto me in the priest’s office.
And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel , saying , This shall be an holy anointing oil unto me throughout your generations.
Upon man’s flesh shall it not be poured , neither shall ye make \add any other\add* like it, after the composition of it: it \add is\add* holy , \add and\add* it shall be holy unto you.
Whosoever compoundeth \add any\add* like it, or whosoever putteth \add any\add* of it upon a stranger , shall even be cut off from his people. \p

¶ And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said unto Moses , Take unto thee sweet spices , stacte , and onycha , and galbanum ; \add these\add* sweet spices with pure frankincense : of each shall there be a like \add weight:\add*
And thou shalt make it a perfume , a confection after the art of the apothecary , tempered together, pure \add and\add* holy :\f + \fr 30.35 \ft tempered…: Heb. salted\f*
And thou shalt beat \add some\add* of it very small , and put of it before the testimony in the tabernacle of the congregation , where I will meet with thee: it shall be unto you most holy.
And \add as for\add* the perfume which thou shalt make , ye shall not make to yourselves according to the composition thereof: it shall be unto thee holy for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
Whosoever shall make like unto that, to smell thereto, shall even be cut off from his people.
